text: unake rasoolon ne kahaah kya us allaah ke baare mein sandeh hai, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ka rachayita hai. vah tumhen bula[1] raha hai, taaki tumhaare paap kshama kar de aur tumhen ek nirdhaarit[2] avadhi tak avasar de. unhonne kahaah to tum hamaare hee jaise ek maanav purush ho, tum chaahate ho ki hamen usase rok do, jisakee pooja hamaare baap-daada kar rahe the. tum hamaare paas koee pratyaksh pramaan lao
